subject: Suite() method.
msgSnippet: which is the advantage of override the suite() method in a TestCase class. I mean, what is better to do: This: public static junit.framework.Test suite() {
messageBody:
which is the advantage of override the suite() method in a TestCase
class.
I mean, what is better to do:
This:
public static junit.framework.Test suite()
{
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(ClassTest.class);
return suite;
}


public static void main(String[] args)
{
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());

}

or that:
public static void main(String[] args)
{
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(ClassTest.class);
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite);

}
